alert.note: Alert for Genesee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 11 at 11:40PM EDT until July 12 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN GENESEE COUNTY... At 1140 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Grand Blanc, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Goodrich around 1145 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Atlas and Rankin. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
